Utica.John C. Hieber Building:
The John C. Hieber Building is a historic commercial building located at Utica in Oneida County, New York.


== Description and history ==
It was built in 1893, and is a five-story, rectangular, flat-roofed, red brick structure, 60 feet by 100 feet, with a random ashlar stone foundation. It was built as a combined sales and warehouse facility.
